body: I'm a old player on wall.mc/avicus, My favourite thing to do is catch hackers. I also like fire and the sun. Because of my username. I also luv all of the mods <3 Yup thats all about me xD Jk theres more! In real life my name is Josh Milc I'm a 14 year old boy that lives in canada. The little brother thing is just a joke xD He doesn't even play minecraft anymore. But i really do have a little bro. And a big sis. I live in canada alberta calgary. Like i was saying i live in calgary. I'm also white Hungarian descendent Now i don't know how to speak Magyar So yah. I love this server and i hope in the future i'll become a mod. I also dream about becoming a chef :D Because i love to cook <3

title: Hello i'm fire506

replies.body: Hello fire! Welcome to the forums! :D I have seen you around in the server a LOT. We do have a few things in common, I like to catch hackers, but at the same time, I like to play and enjoy the server itself :P Anyways, I hope we can hang out together often! {tag=decf6a0c8a7c4463b78165d050a39d7f} says "welcome" to {tag=c2d047c6cda542eea528c6385c3bf033}.
